data.title: Miro and Miroverse
data.description: You can now copy my Miro templates from Miroverse. Can you find the award-winning ones from the bunch?
data.imageDescription: Copy my Miro templates from Miroverse

data.title: Figma
data.description: I've published some Figma designs for the Figma community to consume.
data.imageDescription: Figma designs on the Figma community by Clyde D'Souza

data.title: GitHub
data.description: Most of my projects are open-sourced on GitHub and not all of them found space on my website. Please check out my GitHub profile for more cool projects I've been involved in.
data.imageDescription: Check out Clyde's profile on GitHub

data.title: Medium
data.description: I've written a bunch of articles on Medium to document the problems I solve, or just fun things I learn along the way. Follow my Medium profile to stay up-to-date on what I publish.

data.title: Chrome Extensions
data.description: I've developed some Chrome extensions that are available for download. These solve problems that I faced personally and I hope you find them useful, too.
data.imageDescription: Chrome Extensions developed by Clyde D'Souza

data.title: Canva
data.description: You can now use my design assets in your Canva presentation, posters and other design projects. Simply head over to my profile and select the elements you'd like to use. These designs are also searchable from the Canva editor.
data.imageDescription: Purchase Clyde's designs on Canva to use them in your design projects

data.title: YouTube
data.description: I'm having a fun time building my YouTube channel where I cover a broad range of products and other how-to's.

data.title: Amazon
data.description: You can now purchase my bedtime storybooks and over 50 low-content and no-content paperback books including sketchbooks, activity books, colouring books, A-Z learning books and more from Amazon.
data.imageDescription: Low-content, no-content and other storybooks published by Clyde D'Souza

data.title: Udemy
data.description: My online classes are now available to purchase from Udemy. Click to have a look at my instructor profile for more info.

data.title: Skillshare
data.description: My online classes are available to stream on Skillshare. Use this link to get a month free on me.
data.imageDescription: Watch Clyde's online classes on Skillshare.

data.title: Visual Studio Marketplace
data.description: I've published few Visual Studio, VS Code and Azure DevOps extensions on the marketplace that's been getting some love. Click to find out more.
data.imageDescription: Clyde's Visual Studio extensions on the marketplace.

data.title: Society6
data.description: Shop for some cool merchandise that I've created including some book-themed merch, too.
data.imageDescription: Shop for merchandise created by Clyde on Society6

data.title: Gumroad
data.description: I've published few artifacts on Gumroad which is a marketplace to sell digital products. Do check it out and potentially even grab something from my store.

data.title: Tutorials Point
data.description: My online classes are available to purchase from Tutorials Point. Click the link to visit my instructor profile.
data.imageDescription: Clyde's online classes on Tutorials Point.

data.title: Glide
data.description: Purchase my no-code app templates on Glide.
